name: ListMaintenanceWindows
description:
Retrieve maintenance windows with optional filters for service or team.

This tool retrieves a list of existing maintenance windows, allowing optional filtering by service and/or team. It can specify windows from the past, present, or future. A maintenance window is used to disable services temporarily for a set period. Scoped OAuth requires: `services.read`.
